profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am naturally curious, highly meticulous, and pragmatic. I have a great passion for good communication, productive human behavior, and learning techniques (didactics).

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate software engineer with expertise in modern web technologies. I enjoy building scalable applications and solving complex problems. When I'm not coding, I'm exploring new technologies and contributing to open source projects.
